name: Boxter [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Boxter is a twin-stick Platformer focused on speed and precision movement. This is just an idea I had, if you'd like to see more of this game please let me know!

{WARNING!!! Its only one level, but if you like it and want more just ask}

Controls: [PLEASE USE A Gamepad]

WASD - movement / Arrow keys - attacks

Gamepad/Controller- Joysticks

Email - BoxheadPixelart@gmail.com

twitter - @BoxheadPixelart
